name: Geometry Arena 2
description:
Geometry Arena 2 is a free-form arena-shooter Roguelite game, dedicated to creating an exciting battle experience.
Freely combine difficulty options, components, modules and upgrades to create the best gaming experience for yourself!

Key Features

  • 10+ unique parts and nearly a hundred corresponding modules
  • 10+ difficulty options which allow you to DIY your game
  • 100+ upgrades that can be mixed and matched
  • A fun and rewarding character growth system
  • A hardcore RPG stats system
  • Tense and exciting arena battles
  • Massive bullet hell made up of enemy bodies
  • Endless challenges with progressive difficulty

Summarize

  • Various, free and endless are the core words of Geometry Arena series.
  • This is where you can personally craft the most appropriate gaming experience, immerse yourself in it and get dozens of hours of great memories.
  • May every player find your own fun here!
